string-array.name: strings_prompt_hint_temp
string-array.item: Please provide details on the functions that you were using when the battery started to drain, leading to overheating.
Please provide details on the functions that you were using when the system crashed and you need to restart.
Please provide details on the functions that you were using when the voice calls and signaling operations failed.
Please provide details on the functions that you were using when the WiFi connection stopped working.
Please provide details on the functions that you were using when the camera stopped operating.
Please provide details on the functions that you were using when you encountered problems with the screen.
Please provide details on the functions that you were using when you encountered problems with the fingerprint.
Please provide details on the functions that you were using when you encountered an application exception.
Please provide details on the functions that you were using when you encountered the problems with the memory and the system becomes unresponsive.
Please provide details on the audio/video problem you encountered.
Please provide details on the positioning and sensor problem you encountered.
Please provide details on the Bluetooth problem you encountered.
Please provide details on the problems you have identified.
Please provide details on the problem you have detected.
